divs: Sighting Detailshello i'm 12 years old in november 2008 ( 11 years old ) y was in my recess then it finished on 1:30 , at 1:36 we where entering the classroom when I hear a boy shouting ! what's that ! when i go to see in the window with another kid our teacher saw us and tell us get out the classroom!!!!!!!!!! . i saw 3 orange balls in a triangle formation , from my point of view they were of the size of a coin , but if a would see them near they were giants!!! they were in the mountain to the right side of the central avila mountains , first i think they where parachutes but then i thing ufo? they start to move from the mountain to a giant gloud in 15 min. then they start to turn white until in 20 min. until they disappeared in the clouds then my teacher told me enter to the classroom. thank you!
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Caracas
There were no other sightings in Caracas on or around October 31st 2008
